content.text: I’m Diamond. I am a product designer at Facebook, focused on building meaningful product experiences as part of the News Feed and Stories team. Previously with Logitech as a Visual UX designer.

Originally from Hong Kong, I currently live in New York. Struggling as a New Yorker, I am constantly debating between aesthetics or comfort.
            So far aesthetics have been winning…

I am a full time dog mom for my puppers - Truffle(@handsometruffle) and Waffle. I consider myself a homebody with a travel bug. You will never find me at a local bar, but I am always down to play an intense match of Overcooked.
If you want to talk about design, dogs or need advice in life, shoot me an email and we shall chat over boba.
